神经学叙述：女性大脑健康研究之旅这次富有洞察力的采访探讨了神经科护理方面的差异以及旨在改变研究和治疗以获得更好、包容性健康结果的创新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Neurological-Narratives-A-Journey-into-Womens-Brain-Health-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Neurological-Narratives-A-Journey-into-Womens-Brain-Health-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0abcb23-13e6-4b3e-856f-768579dc4b48 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:17:00 -0500 Neurological Narratives: A Journey into Women's Brain Health Research
说到氯胺酮，Meta 的发帖政策无人能破译人们一直在谈论氯胺酮。这种药物已成为名人、亿万富翁和普通患者的最爱，其中许多人将其视为治疗抑郁症和其他心理健康疾病的潜在神药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/When-it-comes-to-ketamine-Metae28099s-posting-policy-is-no-party-to-decipher.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/When-it-comes-to-ketamine-Metae28099s-posting-policy-is-no-party-to-decipher.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7314337-e23b-449d-a5cb-b1fb8ce0bd28 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 06:44:34 -0500 When it comes to ketamine, Meta’s posting policy is no party to decipher

报告称，人们晚年的心理健康受到系统性和人际年龄歧视的影响最近的心理健康中心简报记录了有关英格兰老年人心理健康状况以及他们获得的支持类型的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Report-claims-mental-health-of-people-in-later-life-has-been-overshadowed-by-systemic-and-interpersonal-ageism。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Report-claims-mental-health-of-people-in-later-life-has-been-overshadowed-by-systemic-and-interpersonal-ageism。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a571c9ec-c041-45b6-8ee4-6de069ec72c5 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 04:42:00 -0500 Report claims mental health of people in later life has been overshadowed by systemic and interpersonal ageism
吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法恶化，与对香烟的担忧相当或超过过去十年，英国吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法有所恶化，认为电子烟危害低于香烟的人数显着下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138f8784-32f5-419a-9213-bbd8e984b92d Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Smokers' views on e-cigarette harm worsen, matching or exceeding concerns for cigarettes
研究揭示了中性粒细胞中隐藏的意想不到的复杂程度3月5日，中国科学院上海免疫与感染研究所（SIII）张晓明教授和张晓明教授在《Cell》杂志上发表了一项研究。复旦大学的高强、范佳和杨力发现了中性粒细胞中隐藏的意想不到的复杂程度，此前人们认为中性粒细胞是相对均匀的短寿命免疫细胞群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-uncovers-unexpected-level-of-complexity-hidden-within-neutropils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-uncovers-unexpected-level-of-complexity-hidden-within-neutropils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4980fd0b-1530-4cae-9053-c1c276e13cf8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:51:00 -0500 Study uncovers unexpected level of complexity hidden within neutrophils
研究人员发现预测不吸烟成年人吸电子烟的心理因素奥塔哥大学的研究人员发现了三个心理因素，可以预测不吸烟者是否会开始吸电子烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Researchers-discover-psychological-factors-that-predict-vaping-uptake-in-non-smoking-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Researchers-discover-psychological-factors-that-predict-vaping-uptake-in-non-smoking-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b2ffb4-e95a-4932-ba8b-747f7aa8d0d0 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:46:19 -0500 Researchers discover psychological factors that predict vaping uptake in non-smoking adults
